poshtips.Text:
Dot-dot (..) can be used like so:

   1..10 | % {$c = Get-Random -Minimum 1 -Maximum 8 ; $c}

Dot-source this function, then pipe things to EasyView to view one line every half-second:

    function EasyView { process { $_; Start-Sleep -seconds .5}}

View the source/definition of a function:

    (Get-Command MyFunction).definition
